summary: Eight years have passed since the first "Arisan!", many things have changed in the lives of a social elite friendship in Jakarta. Amidst the chaotic sequence of events in Jakarta, a friend of them decide to head to Gili island, Lombok.
cast: Cut Mini Theo|Tora Sudiro|Surya Saputra|Aida Nurmala|Rachel Maryam Sayidina|Atiqah Hasiholan|Rio Dewanto|Edward Gunawan|Adinia Wirasti|Keiko Marwan|Cynthia Lamusu|Isabelle Patrice|Jajang C. Noer|Lili Harahap|Melissa Karim|Pong Harjatmo|Sarah Sechan|Ria Irawan|Sapto Soetardjo|Wilza Lubis|Aming Sugandhi|Shanty|Titi Dwijayati|Atika Raisa|Dayu Wijanto
title: Arisan! 2
